register.reg_long_name: Activity Monitors Counter Group Configuration Register

purpose_text.para: Provides information on the number of activity monitor event counters implemented within each counter group.

field_description.para: Counter Group 1 Number of Counters. The number of counters in the auxiliary counter group.
In AMUv1, the permitted range of values is 0 to 16.
Counter Group 0 Number of Counters. The number of counters in the architected counter group.
In AMUv1, the value of this field is 4.
